website_summaries.verdict: A unisex, featherweight option that provides elemental protection without hindering agility.
pros: Lightweight design offers impressive stretch and recovery for maximum agility during exercise
Fabric is soft, and resistant to chlorine and saltwater damage
Features drawstring adjustment cord and hideaway inside pocket
cons: These tights tend to run small

customer_reviews.title: Good value, Nice Length, Great Protection
customer_reviews.text: Good value in comparison with Coolibar and other brands. I like these pants especially because they are not short - with long legs, this allows for ankle coverage. (5' 10" female) I have a funny tan line around my ankles from wearing shorter sun swim tights with sunscreen at the ankles - actually makes my ankles look dirty! The pants wash and dry easily and the logo seems to be holding up. Great for paddling sports. Thanks for offering these great pants. I love wearing sun protective clothing so I can limit my sunscreen chemical exposure and avoid introducing those chemicals into aquatic environments.
customer_reviews.author: Serious Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product And Value
customer_reviews.text: I used to wear another company's product in white, for sun protection when doing daily laps outside. Expensive, and I got tired of replacing it yearly due to deterioration of the fabric. I have owned these for over two years, and love them. No stretching after many hundreds of uses. Keep their shape, my tan lines prove they provide great sun protection. Easy to take off, wet or dry, easy to put on dry, a little harder to put on wet. I am six feet tall and weigh 170 pounds and large was perfect for me. Higly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: JZEL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for snorkeling and scuba diving
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband for a Mexico vacation. He wore them snorkeling and scuba diving every day. He is 5'10", 150lbs and a med. fit perfect. They were snug as they should be but not as tight as compression runners. The material is stretchier than most running tights so it have more give in the water but held their shape well. Quick drying in the sun, they would be mostly dry by the time the dive boat reached our hotel's dock. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Winifred MacKinnon

customer_reviews.title: uv swim tights
customer_reviews.text: I have severe psoriasis and need the sun, sea, and the salt water swimming in the ocean. I have to be very careful though that I don' get sun burn. I have already tried these swim tights swimming they are fantastic and now purchasing my second pair. The service and quality is fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Robert J.

customer_reviews.title: ok fit for women
customer_reviews.text: Am 5'7" 122 lbs, woman, and the small is ok, a little snug through the calves even though I have slender calves. If I got another pair, I might try the M to ensure that stretching doesn't lower the UPF protection (will be wearing them hiking not swimming, so looser fit is ok). There isn't extra fabric in the crotch, so they are indeed unisex or at least ok for women. Cheap looking super thick draw-string. Length is ok, have 33 inseam and they're down to ankle bones.
customer_reviews.author: Minnesotan

customer_reviews.title: Great swim pants
customer_reviews.text: These swim pants are great! I bought a small and they fit almost perfect. I'm 5'9", 125 pounds. They aren't skin tight , not high waisted like the others, just an inch to short but that's ok..They don't sag when swimming and are great for sun protection.
customer_reviews.author: Katlvr

customer_reviews.title: Flawless Product and Service
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a recent trip to Hawaii. I underwent extensive skin grafting almost a year ago and had orders to receive no sun on my legs. These tights performed flawlessly. I wore them on the beach, in the water and hiking without any problems or sun exposure. I highly recommend this product as well as the seller. I originally ordered a medium size and they were a bit large. I contacted the seller and with a time crunch they immediately shipped them to me with the return post paid envelope arriving immediately. Couldn't have been handled better!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: you won't regret it
customer_reviews.text: I have can't be in the sun for long periods of time due to a medical condition. So when I found out about these, I was ecstatic! They fit confortably ,dry fairly quickly and I feel great being able to go to the beach or pool in the summer. So far they haven't faded, so that is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Rei Zepeda

customer_reviews.title: These are much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I wade fish on the Texas coast. I wear these with shorts to protect my legs from jellyfish, scrapes, etc. I used to wear the baggy fishing pants that fill up with water if you have high top boots on. These are much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Comfort55

customer_reviews.title: SPF 50
customer_reviews.text: Why use sunscreen that is not healthy for the reefs when you can buy sun protective clothing that is comfortable and light weight to do the job. We snorkel for hours and I am so happy not to have to use and reapply sunscreen,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Received not as shown....
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive as shown in the picture. I expected the 'STINGRAY' word to be on the leg, but I got one that was totally black with a small stingray at the top. Looks to feminine. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: CARLOS RIVERA

customer_reviews.title: these are so much better than the traditional pants that zip off the legs ...
customer_reviews.text: these are so much better than the traditional pants that zip off the legs they don't hold water when you get in the boat and don't flap in the wind they work great and hold up i use them around 150-200 days a year wade fishing after 2 years my other ones are still going i just knocked a hole in the knees which was my fault so i ordered new ones .
customer_reviews.author: kenneth  griffith

customer_reviews.title: The feel isn’t right, does help protect from the sun
customer_reviews.text: Very thin material and don’t fit too snug on your body. I bought these to help block my skin from the sun. I wouldn’t buy another pair but my legs did stop burning when I wore these out swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Size Large fits is fine. 6'2", 185lbs, 35 waist, 33-34 inseam. Slim body type.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Just what I need. Is well done! I like it, one of these my best buy this year!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for surfing.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for surfing, very light, not heavy when wet. fit was good. wouldn't use it for swimming, bur by all means for surfing. will buy again. The size ran good.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Luc

customer_reviews.title: Best quality. Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Best quality. Worth the price! Durable and lasting material. Holds form and doesn't lose its stretch. I will absolutely be a repeat customer. As someone who is allergic to UV light I can assure you it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Amerilys

customer_reviews.title: The tights are great, but I had to buy them twice because ...
customer_reviews.text: The tights are great, but I had to buy them twice because I paid attention to the size chart. It was completely off. I suggest you buy according to your regular cloth size. Other than that, I'm pretty satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little on the small size, however orotects well ...
customer_reviews.text: A little on the small size, however orotects well from the sun. I use them for snorkeling.
customer_reviews.author: Aharon Avramovich

customer_reviews.title: Sun protective tights
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband to wear in Florida while snorkeling and kayaking. No sunburns! Do not expect this to be quick-dry material, though. The drying time is similar to a women's lycra bathing suit.
customer_reviews.author: LizG

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: WAY too small and return shipping is on the buyer.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Valunas

customer_reviews.title: They block the sun's harmful rays.
customer_reviews.text: The sun block actually works, they fit as expected and they're easy to care for. I'm totally satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Richard Figgie

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad I bought these for my husband!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and knew to order a larger size that what my husband typically wears. I thought they were a little large on him but he LOVES them! They are light and dried quickly after he swam in them and protected his legs from the sun. Just what he wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia L. Prewitt

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Product fits well, material very forgiving. Have not been in water yet, but tight feels well made and retains shape after being stretched in dry form.
customer_reviews.author: Ely

customer_reviews.title: You'll love it
customer_reviews.text: I burn easily and was invited to Florida for a few weeks. I didn't get a burn in the pool even at noon! I love this product. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline in Culver

customer_reviews.title: Great product for snorkeling...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Fits well. Lightweight. Used it for snorkeling in both Maui and the Galapagos. Good UV protection without having to slather on all that suntan lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Rick H

customer_reviews.title: I'm a male, I'm 5ft 8.4in and 161 lb. Ordered large and they fit perfectly. Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a male, I'm 5ft 8.4in and 161 lb. Ordered large and they fit perfectly. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Lenoir

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great. Used for swimming in the ocean and on the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit.
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'8" and 175 lbs and the medium fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Felt great, worked for a week of snorkeling with no ...
customer_reviews.text: Felt great, worked for a week of snorkeling with no sunburn on my legs, which was the main reason I wanted them.
customer_reviews.author: G. H.

customer_reviews.title: Best swimming pants ever
customer_reviews.text: This are the best swimming pants I've ever bought. Chlorine resistant, great quality and fit, they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Javier M.

customer_reviews.title: Swim Tights
customer_reviews.text: Its advertised as Unisex (mens & womans) But when arrived the tag says MEN TIGHTS. These are definitely not for woman unless you like wearing the top of the tights up to your chest! Nice for a man though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gear. Glad I finally incorporated this into my ...
customer_reviews.text: Great gear. Glad I finally incorporated this into my lap swim routine (at noon).
customer_reviews.author: Samuel M. Randolph

customer_reviews.title: The fit was perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I use these for kayaking. They do the job. Keeps me protected from the sun. They breathe very well so you wont get hot in them. The fit was perfect for me. I'm 5'10 200 Lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Nicoya

customer_reviews.title: They work great. I'll be purchasing a second pair soon
customer_reviews.text: I use these tights while riding my recumbent trike. They work great. I'll be purchasing a second pair soon.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W. Rowe

customer_reviews.title: excellent swimming suit
customer_reviews.text: for those with knee suffer and struggle in swimming, try to wear this pants it can give you a big different feeling, comfortable is the word you may look for it.
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Good, but order larger
customer_reviews.text: Very small, but this was disclosed on the site & through reviews. Ordered 3 sizes up & they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Jenson

customer_reviews.title: these are great and functional
customer_reviews.text: these are great and functional, and they do the trick for SUP paddleboarding in the ocean in the summer, when you don't want to fall on any giant jelly fish in the Pacific NW.
customer_reviews.author: Atsin Drawde

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great protection from sun but size too big for me. i ordered a small
customer_reviews.author: Hawaii Archer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! My wife was very happy with it .
customer_reviews.author: James anderson

customer_reviews.title: I bought that product but that is not fit. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought that product but that is not fit. If I return that item I pay extra fee?? For examle delivery fee.
customer_reviews.author: YUJINLEE

customer_reviews.title: LIKE ALL THE SWIMSUIT ARE
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT THIS FOR SWIMING, BUT UNFORTUNATELLY THEY ARE NOT DOUBLED IN THE GENITALS AREA , AS IS NORMAL.....LIKE ALL THE SWIMSUIT ARE! ANYWHAY, CHINESE CHEAP STUFF...AND IN MY OPINION IT FIT BETTER TO WOMEN THAN BOYS! I LL KEEP IT BECAUSE IS THE ONLY LONG PANTS I FOUND AROUND HERE!
customer_reviews.author: radu costinel

product_meta.title: Stingray Australia UV Sun Protective Swim Tights for Men & Women - Swim Pants with Drawstring - Sun Protection Swimming Leggings - Sizes Small to XXL.
product_meta.description: This is a pair of UV protective, unisex swim tights. These tights are a smart active wear item - designed for comfort and support – you are set for a work out or the water! The slimming style is made for an easy fit with elastic waist and drawstring cord, hideaway inside pocket and surf logo print on leg. The fabric is high quality and retains color and shape. The garment is simple to wash – just rinse after wear. These swim tights are an ideal choice for low-high impact activity in and out of the water. Designed to maximize freedom of movement with excellent stretch and recovery- ideal for running, gym, walking, yoga, surfing, swimming, diving, snorkeling and and other water activities. Comfort is important- Stingray uses the softest High Quality chlorine resistant fabric to fit like a glove and remove with ease. This signature fabric provides the best in sun protective wear with the highest sun protection rating of EXCELLENT PROTECTION which blocks 98% of the sun's UV radiation. The fabric is Chemical-free, the tight weave of the easy care fabric provides the sun protection -- no zinc or other chemicals are used in the fabric. Designed in Australia by Stingray Australia, one of the leaders in sun protective clothing. Sizing is designed for a close fit to be more comfortable in the water. Sizes: S (8) M (10) L (12) XL (14) XXL (16)-- WAIST--around in inches: 24-26- S ; 26-28-M ; 29-31- L ; 32-34-XL ; 34-36-XXL. HIP --around in inches: 34-36-S ; 36-38-M ; 38-41-L ; 41-43-XL ; 43-46-XXL.
feature_bullets: Unisex Men or Women's uv sun protective swim pants. THESE TIGHTS RUN SMALL...SEE SIZING CHART BELOW.
Italian-made, Soft, Chlorine-resistant and Salt Water resistant Fabric.
Chemical free, easy care fabirc offers maximum 50+SPF/UPF sun protection.
Built for exercise in and out of the water, it is designed to maximize freedom of movement with excellent stretch and recovery.
Designed in Australia by Stingray Australia, one of the leaders in sun protective clothing.
